intro: Crotalaria purpureolineata, commonly known as purple line crotalaria, is a flowering plant belonging to the Fabaceae family. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its distinctive purple-tinged foliage and showy yellow flowers. The plant produces seed pods that are typically hairy and contain several oblong seeds. It is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its vibrant color and unique appearance. However, it may contain toxic compounds and should be handled with care.
